name: TobaccoUserReceivedTobaccoCessationIntervention
title: Tobacco User Received Tobacco Cessation Intervention
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Preventive Care and Screening),(Data Element Scope: Population identification),(Inclusion Criteria: Patients identified as tobacco users who received cessation intervention),(Exclusion Criteria: Exclude patients identified as tobacco non-users)

concept.display: Patient identified as a tobacco user received tobacco cessation intervention (counseling and/or pharmacotherapy)

contains.display: Patient identified as a tobacco user received tobacco cessation intervention during the measurement period or in the six months prior to the measurement period (counseling and/or pharmacotherapy)
